line_1: For lo! each falling sand his folly chides,
line_2: Nor void of moral, tho' unheeded, glides

line_1: The shepherd-swain at first exhorting chides
line_2: When the young sun with flowery Maia rides,

line_1: The shepherd-swain at first exhorting chides
line_2: Crowd back, affrighted at the rolling tides:

line_1: The shepherd-swain at first exhorting chides
line_2: With his rude crook he wounds their tender sides;
